name: Block Brick Puzzle Classic
description:
This Block Puzzle game gets all the charm of the Puzzle game Simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody
Block Brick Puzzle Classic Block Puzzle Game is classical game and very interesting with very nice graphics design.
Itíll take you back to the childhood. Challenge yourself and compete with your friends, colleagues and the family
From now on, let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game!
Once you start, you'll be hooked.
You can play games for FREE!

Features Block Brick Puzzle Classic Block Puzzle Game
- Simple rules and Easy to control.
- Various Blocks and very corlorful graphic.
- Smooth and delicate animation and very cool effect design!
- Funny sound effects.
- Hours of fun, exciting play and never rush!

How to play Block Brick Puzzle Classic Block Puzzle Game

- Touch in screen to rotate block
- Swipe down to move fast block

Don't worry! No time limits! No rush Block puzzle game!

Enjoy! Thank you so much!

Now, try it and Iam sure you will like this Block Brick Puzzle Classic Block Puzzle Game
